department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Amendment to closing time of proposal submission for the Des Joachims Bridge Abutment Wall Project.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME...Writes on the final note
full_summary:
===============

**Title (English and French)**
---------------------------

* Des Joachims Bridge Abutment Wall Project

**RFx Information**
----------------

* **Reference Number:** WS4364912356

**Publication Details**
----------------------

* **Publication Date:** 2024-01-02

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-01-02

**Contract and Tender Information**
---------------------------------

* **Tender Description:** The solicitation is for the Des Joachims Bridge Abutment Wall Project. A correction to the closing time has been made, and all bidders must submit their bids by January 30, 2024, at 14:00 (EST). Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (Specialized Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Tendering
* **Trade Regulations:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Deployment Regions:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact and Government Details**
-------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) (Canada)
* **Contract Lead Contact:** Gregoire Morin
* **Contact Information:** 
  * Email: gregoire.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * Alt. Phone: N/A
  * Alt. Fax: N/A

**Important Notes**
------------------

* All bids submitted after January 30, 2024, at 14:00 (EST) will be considered non-responsive.
